msg.chatGPTOnlyMac: ChatGPT integration is only supported on macOS
msg.sizeEstimation: Estimated: {0} files, {1} (~{2} tokens), with Markdown formatting: {3} (~{4} tokens)
config.maxFileSize.description: The maximum file size (in bytes) to process
config.directoryStructure.showFileExtens: Show file extensions in file names
config.directoryStructure.useEmoji.descr: Use emoji icons in directory structure display
config.prefixText.description: Text to be added at the beginning of the generated document
config.useGitignore.description: Use patterns from .gitignore file to exclude files
config.useVscodeignore.description: Use patterns from .vscodeignore file to exclude files
config.enableCompression: Remove comments, unnecessary whitespace and newlines (Tree-sitter)
config.gitDiff.range.description: Git revision range (e.g. 'origin/main..HEAD'). Empty for working tree changes.
matomeru.outputFormat.description: Output format for the generated document (markdown / yaml)
msg.vscodeignorePatternLoaded: Loaded {0} patterns and {1} negation patterns from .vscodeignore
description: Combine and copy your entire codes into one AI-ready document (Markdown or YAML).
config.includeDependencies.description: Scan and include import/dependency statements from each file, generating Mermaid graphs in Markdown output.
config.mermaid.maxNodes.description: Maximum number of nodes to render in Mermaid dependency graph. Warning shown when exceeded.
config.yaml.includeContent.description: Include file content in YAML output. Disable for large projects to avoid memory issues.
